recipes.name: Chargrilled Vegetable Stack
recipes.description:
Preheat the oven to 180°C. Lightly spray a spring latched tin with baking spray and line the rim with baking paper.

Lay two wraps on the base of the tin then spread with ¼ of the pasta sauce, then add a layer of vegetables.

Add a wrap on top and repeat the steps above until the Vegetable Stack is complete. Make sure to end the stack with a wrap on top.

Place in the oven and bake for 30 minutes.

Remove from oven and allow to stand for 5 minutes. Sprinkle the feta, toasted nuts and basil leaves on top. Peel off baking paper and cut into wedges.

Tip:

Wraps make a great alternative to lasagne pasta sheets and cook a lot faster as well.
recipes.ingredientes:
• 6 Farrah Wraps (assorted flavours)
  • 2 cups blanched spinach leaves
  • 1 cup spicy tomato sauce
  • ½ eggplant , sliced and chargrilled
  • 1 courgette, sliced and chargrilled
  • 1 carrot sliced, steamed and chargrilled
  • 1 pumpkin sliced, steamed and chargrilled
  • 3 portobello mushrooms, sliced and chargrilled
  • 3 capsicums, deseeded and chargrilled
  • 3 tsp toasted nuts
  • ¼ cup crumbled feta
  • Basil leaves to garnish

recipes.name: Antipasto Skewers
recipes.description:
1. Thread the sausage, haloumi, artichoke, onion and eggplant onto skewers. Spray skewers with cooking oil.

2. Preheat a barbecue to moderate heat. Cook and turn skewers for 5-7 minutes or until browned.

3. To make pesto, process basil, garlic, parmesan and pine nuts until chopped finely. While processor is going, gradually add combined oil and juice until pesto is almost smooth.

4. Serve antipasto skewers with pesto drizzled over the top.
recipes.ingredientes:
• 2 chorizo sausages, thickly sliced
  • 200 g haloumi cheese, cut into 2cm cubes
  • 280 g marinated artichoke hearts, drained, halved
  • 1 large red onion, cut into thin wedges
  • 2 eggplants, cut in to 2cm pieces
  • Cooking oil spray
  • 12 skewers
  • 1 1/2 cups firmly packed basil leaves
  • 1 clove garlic, chopped
  • 2 Tbsp fresh parmesan, grated
  • 1 Tbsp pine nuts, toasted
  • 1/4 cup olive oil
  • 1 Tbsp lemon juice

recipes.name: Seafood Pasta Salad
recipes.description:
1. In a large frying pan, heat 1 Tbsp oil and toss in 1 clove of crushed garlic. Allow the garlic to infuse the oil for 1 to 2 minutes.

2. Add in the marinara mix and cook in the garlic oil for 5 to 7 minutes, until cooked through. Remove from the pan and set aside to cool.

3. Cook pasta as per packet instructions and drain well. Refresh your pasta with some cold water, drain again ensuring all the water has been removed.

4. When cool, toss into a large bowl and mix with the cooked marinara mix.

5. To make the vinaigrette: place lemon juice, 1 clove of crushed garlic, horseradish cream, pepper and salt in a bowl. Whisk in the first few drops of oil then pour the remainder of the oil in a steady stream and whisk until thick and emulsified. Store in the fridge until you are ready to dress the salad.

6. Pour half the vinaigrette over the marinara mix and toss through.

7. When ready to serve, pour over the remainder of the dressing.
recipes.ingredientes:
• 1 Tbsp olive oil, plus 2/3 cup for the dressing
  • 2 garlic cloves, crushed
  • 500g fresh marinara mix, well drained
  • 300g pasta spirals
  • ½ red onion, diced
  • ½ yellow capsicum, diced
  • ½ red capsicum, diced
  • 1 Tbsp dill, chopped
  • 1 Tbsp chives, chopped
  • 2 Tbsp flat leaf parsley, roughly chopped
  • ¼ cup lemon juice
  • 2 Tbsp horseradish cream
  • pinch of salt
  • pinch each of white pepper

recipes.name: Crispy Cauliflower Salad
recipes.description:
1. Preheat oven to 200°C (180°C fan forced). Place cauliflower in a roasting pan. Add 2 tablespoon of the oil and toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper. Roast for 30 minutes or until golden. Cool and transfer to a bowl.

2. Meanwhile, place pine nuts onto another tray. Roast for 5-8 minutes or until golden and add to the cauliflower.

3. Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic. Cook for 4 minutes or until softened. Sprinkle Moroccan seasoning and stir until combined. Add couscous, cranberries and water. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until couscous is tender. Remove from heat and cool.

4. Combine couscous, cauliflower, remaining oil and lemon juice. Roughly chop half the coriander and stir through the salad. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to a serving platter and garnish with remaining coriander.
recipes.ingredientes:
• 1 cauliflower, trimmed, cut into florets
  • 1/2 cup olive oil
  • 2 Tbsp pinenuts
  • 1 red onion, thinly sliced
  • 2 garlic cloves, crushed
  • 2 tsp Moroccan seasoning
  • 1 cup pearl couscous
  • 1/4 cup dried cranberries
  • 1 1/2 cups boiling water
  • 1/3 cup lemon juice
  • 1 bunch bunch coriander, sprigs removed

recipes.name: Steak with Pea Puree
recipes.description:
1. Sprinkle beef with rosemary, salt and pepper to season. Cook on barbeque over high heat. When cooked to your liking, leave to rest on a plate and cover with foil.

2. While meat is resting, heat a medium saucepan over high heat. Add peas, butter and water. Bring to the boil, remove from heat. Process peas until almost smooth. Season to taste.

3. Serve pea purée with steaks.
recipes.ingredientes:
• 4 beef scotch fillet steaks (approx 600g)
  • 1 Tbsp fresh rosemary, finely chopped
  • 500 g frozen green peas
  • 30 g butter
  • 2 Tbsp water
  • Salt and pepper to taste

recipes.name: Summer Salad with Dijon Dressing
recipes.description:
1. To make the dressing, place the oil, vinegar, honey and mustard into a small jar, and shake well.

2. Onto a platter arrange the lettuce, cucumber, tomatoes and avocado, and sprinkle the basil leaves over the top.

3. Season with salt and pepper, then drizzle with dressing.
recipes.ingredientes:
• 1/4 cup oil
  • 2 Tbsp white vinegar
  • 1 Tbsp honey
  • 1 tsp Dijon mustard
  • 120 g bag mixed lettuce
  • 1/2 telegraph cucumber, cut into pieces
  • 4 small tomatoes, quartered
  • 1 avocado, cut into wedges
  • 1/2 basil leaves
  • Salt
  • Freshly ground pepper
